exceptions.tactic: apply is_derive_n_PSeries with (n := n) (a := a) (x := x).

In environment n : nat a : nat -> R x : R H : Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) IHn : match n with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n (PSeries a) n) x end Unable to unify "Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a)" with "ex_derive (Derive_n (PSeries a) n) x".

original: intros. unfold ex_derive_n. induction n. - intros. apply I. - intros. apply ex_derive. apply is_derive_n_PSeries with (n := n) (a := a) (x := x). apply H.
